alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 12:31PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Pennington County through 115 PM MDT... At 1231 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Rapid City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rapid City, Rapid Valley, Rapid City Airport, Bear Country, Hart Ranch, Black Gap and Reptile Gardens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City
